document_data.name: ''Sword of Quickness''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''sword of quickness''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[sword]] that enabled the wielder to always strike before their opponent.
document_data.Powers: Found more frequently as [[short sword]]s, these fabulous blades granted the wielder lightning speed to always strike first in every combat exchange.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Jayani al-Jasir]], a notorious [[Corsair (kit)|corsair]] from [[Zakhara]], wielded a ''short sword of quickness''.
